patterns: What kind of work do you do?
responses: I'm Vaibhav's assistant! He's a FullStack developer specializing in React.js, Next.js and modern web applications
My creator is Vaibhav Dwivedi, a self-taught developer who builds responsive web apps with great UI/UX
I represent Vaibhav - a developer focused on creating high-performance web applications using cutting-edge tech
Vaibhav is currently focused on developing new web applications
He's actively working on client projects and personal initiatives
As a developer, he's usually coding - but I can answer most questions!
Key projects: 1) LaborHutt - Local truck services 2) BobcatTours - City tours 3) Manganerdy - Comic database 4) Impressive - Interest matching
My featured work includes LaborHutt (logistics platform), BobcatTours (tour booking), Manganerdy (comic scraper), and Impressive (social discovery)
Check out these creations: LaborHutt for local moving, BobcatTours for NYU-guided tours, Manganerdy for comics, and Impressive for connecting people
LaborHutt connects people needing moving/pickup services with truck owners nearby - built with Next.js and Firebase
It's a logistics platform helping users find affordable local moving solutions using neighbor's trucks - saves up to 60% on moving costs!
LaborHutt: A peer-to-peer truck service app created with Next.js and TailwindCSS that makes local moving easy and affordable
BobcatTours connects travelers with NYU students for authentic city experiences - built with Next.js
It's a tour platform where NYU students guide visitors through cities - featured in NYU's campus newsletter!
BobcatTours: A Next.js application that books personalized city tours guided by local university students
Manganerdy collects comic data from multiple sources into a beautiful interface - powered by Next.js and MongoDB
It's a comprehensive comic database with 10K+ entries that aggregates content from various publishers and sources
Manganerdy: A comic information hub that scrapes and presents manga/comic data in an organized way
Impressive helps people connect through shared interests - created with React and Firebase
It's a social discovery app that matches users based on hobbies and interests - reduces search time by 75%!
Impressive: A React-based platform that helps you find people with similar interests and passions
Frontend: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS | Backend: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB | Tools: Figma, Jest, Git
My core stack: React/Next.js for frontend, Node/Express for backend, MongoDB for database, and Tailwind for styling
Tech preferences: JavaScript ecosystem with React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind
Visit vaibhav-op.vercel.app for contact options - I'm available for projects!
Reach out through my portfolio site - I'm flexible with time zones
For collaborations, please check the contact section on my portfolio website
I was a System Engineer at Infosys where I built landing pages, implemented TypeScript state management, and achieved 70% test coverage
At Infosys, I developed responsive UIs, created efficient state management systems, and maintained high test coverage
My professional experience includes frontend engineering at Infosys focusing on React, TypeScript, and testing
